description:
This self-paced course provides participants with the opportunity to explore, assess, and document learning mastered through a variety of life experiences.

                                            Syllabus
                        
Week One: Self Assessment (Inventory)
Week Two: Exploration (Honing Skills)
Week Three: Documentation (Research)
Week Four: Looking Forward (Survey the Land)
Week Five: Building and Organizing
Week Six: Reviewing and Revising
title: Discover Your Value: Turning Experience into College Credit
